1. Install R

    i) Download from https://cran.rstudio.com/bin/windows/base/

2. Install RStudio

    i) Download from https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/

    ii) Pick the Windows one from Installers for Supported Platforms

3. Install packages

    i) Open RStudio

      A. Pin it to the taskbar

    ii) In the bottom right-hand pane look at the tabs at the top and select 
Packages.

    iii) Click Install

      A. In the Packages box type `RcmdrPlugin.KMggplot2, OIdata, openintro, readr, tidyverse`

      B. Click Install

      C. Watch the download box and text flow by

    iv) Check the box by RcmdrPlugin.KMggplot2 in the Package pane.

      A. A window will pop-under.  Alt+Tab to get to it and click Yes and then OK.
